A '''jungle bush''' is a variant of the [[jungle tree]] that generate along the ground in [[jungle]] biomes. It cannot be grown from [[jungle sapling]]s.

== Generation ==
Unlike normal jungle trees, jungle bushes can generate in all jungle [[biome]] variants: [[jungle]], [[bamboo jungle]], and [[sparse jungle]].

Jungle bushes generate as 1&ndash;2 [[jungle log]]s surrounded by [[oak leaves]]<ref>{{bug|MC-156133|||WAI}}</ref>. They are typically 1–3 layers tall and cover the floor of jungle biomes.
